reviews.review: not that bad and not too perfect. even though there are a few bugs that may happen in the game. but i think dev knows it and start to fix the bug and gave the game even bigger update at the same time.  just dont hate them for being late for update.
可玩性很高

I think the game is fun, but being a killer sucks at the moment. If several suriviors have a toolbox, or that perk that lets you sabotage without them, they can literally make it so you have two options, try to get them to the basement, or let them bleed out on the ground, which nets you almost no blood points. I propose that you should make it so that some hooks can be destroyed, but not every aboveground hook on the map. Literally, once they destroy all the aboveground hooks they just  run around, since it won't really matter if you see them. Seriously, this is why people play survivor more than killer, since you can beat the killer so easily with this strategy, especially at higher levels where most people have the perk. And it isn't as if you can defend the hooks, since the hitbox for someone when the sabotage a hook is strangely small. Also, you need to get a better anticheat, since their are people who can finish a generator solo with no toolbox instantly, which is always annoying. That and the issue of people who use speed hacks, since sprintburst isn't infinite. that fact that reporting them for cheating doesn't work most of the time makes them very brazen about it, literally saying that they use hacks in the post-game chat. 

Also, the matchmaking system breaks whenever I try to be a survivor, so maybe one out of five tries will get me into a game, and I have to restart after each fail. That, and there is always the issue of people not loading in all the way so we start with 3-2 survivors instead of four, screwing the survivors over. this happens to me when I play killer or survivor.

I'd reccomend this game, but I'd only reccomend playing killer if you want to be frustrated, since survivors are always cheating, quitting, or making ti impossible to kill them in any effective way. You could solve the no hooks issue with iron grasp or agitation, but I have only agitation level one and iron grasp is annoyingly rare. 

Of course, you could make it so the killer can repair hooks, it just takes a while, or make it so sabotaging hooks temporarily disables them, allowing them to be used later or requiring th killer to interact with them first. either that or remove sabotaging hooks, since that wouldn't hurt survivors very much, especially since the game is currently unbalanced in survivor's favor.

There's no doubt that it is indeed a fun and innovative game. But, on the other hand, this game has been, is, and unfortunately will be too much buggy.

I've been playing since this summer, and since the first moment I have had a hard time just trying to do something so basic as joining a match. Some months have past, and of course you could think that those bugs would be fixed. Yeah, sure.

Not only they did not, but this december got even worst. It's incredibly ridiculous that still two months later if you dare to play the solo mode, you'll get stuck in the loading screen, forcing you to play the "survive with friends mode". But wait, although you get to join the lobby, developers have another surprise for you. Do you remember those poor and unaware players who tried to play the solo mode? Well, they'll be there, in the lobby, waiting for you, stucked in the loading screen, so when the game finally starts, they'll get disconnected, and then you'll have to deal with the killer with one or two less survivors.

UPDATE 09 july 17:
Well, this big matchmaking bug has been fixed for many months. This game still has matchmaking bugs most of the time, and other kind of bugs of course. They continuously fix and break things. But, well... most of the time at least you can play and have fun. It's annoyning, but in spite of its bugs, it's the best asimetric horror game so far. So I'll edit this to mark this game as recommended... for now.
If the bugs that dont let me play in games would be fixed then mabye I would recomend it but for now, no.

Gli sviluppatori se ne fregano di chi ha pagato 20 euro per il gioco, piuttosto che impegnarsi nel fixare e bilanciare il gioco per pc, preferiscono spendere tempo e risorse per portarlo su altre console e per creare dlc a pagamento.
Se volete un consiglio non comprate il gioco e aspettate che esca qualcosa dello stesso genere. (Dead by Daylight non è ancora affondato solo per la sua unicità)

La gente dovrebbe capire che quando i giochi sono in via di sviluppo ci possono essere cose che non vanno. Il gioco è innanzitutto originale e divertente, solo dopo buggato. Ci sono molti lati positivi, come la possibilità di migliorare e fare esperienza per davvero, il fatto che si giochi solamente con persone vere, il poter stravolgere la prospettiva e mettersi nei panni sia dei Survivors che dei Killers. Puoi scegliere anche la tua personale strategia, c'è chi campera o chi predilige il divertimento e lascia più spazio ai survivors; dall'altra chi fa solo i generatori o chi fa da esca. Il gioco nel complesso è ben studiato e sebbene ci siano diversi problemi è perfettamente giocabile. Tra i maggiori punti negativi cito il fatto che: non si può praticamente giocare in 4 perché l'attesa aumenta esponenzialmente da 1 giocatore (3secondi), a 2 (max 2-3minuti tranne eccezioni), a 3 (2-15minuti)e a 4 (10-30minuti); la causa di tutto cio è più o meno sconosciuta ma sembra che sia nella lista delle cose da risolvere; capita che ci siano problemi con le hitbox e che quindi ti prenda anche se non dovrebbe;il pallet non è sceso o scende stordendo il killer ma ti becchi lo stesso il colpo; alcune volte non si avvia e devi riaprirlo; altre volte non ti fa entrare in partita da "gioca come sopravvisuto" (c'è comunque il modo di entrare in partita, e anche se è un po' macchinoso non ti costringe a riavviare il gioco)

Chiudo dicendo che nonostante ci siano numerosi bug ( comunque trascurabili, visto che è perfettamente giocabile) e certe volte faccia tiltare a livelli inverosimili, è comunque un gioco che sa dare tante soddisfazioni. Non mi pento affatto dell'acquisto e anzi ne sono felice. Lo consiglio.

Dead by Daylight ist ein Spiel mit großen Potenzial. Am Anfang war der Killer etwas OP aber das hat man komplett zunichte gemacht in dem man den Überlebenden die Chance gibt die Haken auf der Map zu Sabotieren. Ein Killer gegen vier Überlebende ist total Blödsinnig,man hat keine Chance so schnell sind sämtliche Haken zerstört. Das Matchmacking ist eine Absolute Katastrophe, man wird in Lobbys gesteckt wo man gegen Leute antritt die den Anschein machen sie wären LvL 70 gegen einen Killer LvL 3. 
Wie gesagt am Anfang ein wirklich sehr gelungenes Spiel. Man hätte dem Killer etwas weniger "Macht" geben müssen und alles wäre ok aber nein man dreht den Spieß um und gibt den Überlebenden noch mehr "Macht" als der Killer hatte. 
Vielen Dank liebe Entwickler für das totale versauen eines am Anfang wirklich sehr guten Spieles.
Ich hoffe nur das Friday the 13th nicht genau so abkackt wie dieses einst schöne Game.

萌新，刚入手游戏，被改档气的死去活来，确实也起过改档的念头，但是，有了血点能怎样，该上树还是一样上树，你用改来的血点，失去的是磨练如何和屠夫周旋，和人皇赛高的时间。时间会证明一切，菜鸡就是菜鸡，皇就是皇，我宁愿一刀一刀砍上去，也不会再起改档的念头了。别拿技能当借口，贪心不足蛇吞象，有了技能就会想要红处，想要红齿轮。破化游戏体验不说，还毁掉好端端的一款游戏。
总的来说杀机还是好评，可以锻炼心态，长胆子，不说了，我先上会儿树先。值得一试，推荐。

感觉越更新人类越弱，我感觉开发商在决定游戏平衡性的时候没有把玩家的不同技术水平考虑进去，而是将所有玩家的技术想的一样，然后进行数据修改，平衡，导致我感觉游戏越来越垃圾

朋友们好啊，我是混元形意守尸人天龙巴布。刚才有个朋友问我，巴老师发生甚么事了，我说怎么回事，给我发了几张截图。我一看！哦！院来是佐天，有两个年轻人，三十多岁，一个体重九十多公斤（指大卫），一个体重七十多公斤（指德怀特），塔萌说，哎，有一个说是我在春木镇练贴膜，经常回头颈椎练坏了，巴老师你能不能教教我浑元功法，矮…帮助治疗一下，我的颈椎。我说可以。我说你在春木镇死练贴膜，不好用，他不服气。我说小大卫：你一个钢筋来躲我三层拉锯，他躲不开。他说你这也没用。我说我这个有用，这是重做，zzz传统想法是讲平衡的千斤拨四两。二百多斤的嘤国大力士（指大张伟），都握不动我这一个手指头。啊…哈！他非要和我试手，我说可以。哎！…我一说呢他“啪”就站起来了，很快啊！然后上来就是一个爆柜一个打击一个砸板，我全部防出去，防出去了啊，防出去以后自然是传统功夫以点到为止，锤子放到他鼻子上没打他，我笑一下准备收锤，因为这时间，以传统功夫的点到为止他已经输了，如果这一锤发力，一锤就把他鼻子打骨折了，放在鼻子上没有锤他，他承认，我先打到他面部。他不知道锤子放在他鼻子上，他也承认，我先打到他面部。啊，我收锤的时间不打了，他一记紫光干来照我脸，啊，我大意了啊，没有闪，他的手电给我眼，啊，右眼，晃了一下，但没关系啊！他也说，啊他截图也说了，两分多钟以后，当时流眼泪了，捂着眼，我说婷婷。然后两分...两分多钟以后，诶就好了，我说小伙子你不讲武德你不懂，他说巴老师对不...对不起，我不懂规矩。啊，我是…他说他是乱照的，他可不是乱照的啊，红灯泡绿电池白护卫，训练有素，后来他说他搞了三四年的直播，啊，看来是有bear来！这两个年轻人不讲武德，来，骗！来，偷袭！我这个一十九岁的小巴布，这好吗？这不好。我劝这位年轻人耗子尾汁，好好反思，以后不要再犯这样的聪明，小聪明，啊，呃…杀机要以和为贵，要讲武德，不要带顶配手电筒，谢谢朋友们！

Upon release Dead by Daylight was lacking some much-needed features, most notably the ability to quickly and easily play along with friends. Fortunately the developer released a major update to the game which patched up this missing functionality and added a new killer at the same time. It's great to see the game being updated and improved (the pressure of the forthcoming Friday the 13th game might have something to do with that). Overall a fun game, you will almost certainly yell at your tv when playing as the survivor. Best with friends.

This game is an amazing experience, and has amazing elements for example the level blood point system works in rewarding/supporting manner. The maps have high detail causing full on real feel environment, leading to a thrilling bone chilling experience. The major issue I had is load times due lack of killer based population and user internet problems, even if you have a great connection. Overall I give this game 8 out of 10 stars.
Thank you for making this game happen
Soooooo awesome！ I also play resident evil 7, but to be honest say, Dead by dayligth is more exciting than that.  Dead by dayligth can stimulate my adrenaline!
游戏不错，哈哈哈

Great game to play with friends.  For survivors, it depends how you load out against the killer.  For killers, if you got the right load out against survivors, you'll have the advantage.  As for the PIP system for ranking, killers have the overwhelming advantage.  If a survivor gets disconnected form the Killer host, the survivor will loose PIP for not getting enough points.  The killer can continue playing as the disconnected survivor counts as a kill.  Basically, don't count on the ranking system to be fair.

За свои почти 1к часов в игре я встречал достаточное кол-во багов, но попадались они редко, тобишь самая основная проблема игры это сервера, а так она отличная и затягивает на долго, разрабы молодцы, надеюсь вы сделаете так, чтобы сервера были замечательными и доски больше никогда не пробивались :*
不错哦
对这个游戏的评价就是很尊重中国人！为什么这么说，当你玩GTA5和H1Z1就知道什么是歧视中国消费者，而黎明杀机不同他对中国的新年尊重，特地给我们打造哪件属于我们这个大家庭的服装，所以我很喜欢黎明杀机，他不但没有歧视中国人还这样的尊重我们，为什么不给好评，之所以有差评就是因为1.3.1版本还没有对于人和鬼之间的平衡，很多萌新看见鬼都不知所措，所以导致差评，希望1.4版本会对萌新有所照顾！
